page.title: 13JOBS IN THE LUSTON AREA
page.content: Because our area is essentially rural with a predominance of farms the main occupation in the area is therefore{ {farm work.}The other types of employment to be found in our area actually centre on the few amenities. One of the largest employers is the {Primary School}which provides jobs for 9 people; 5 teachers,3 dinner ladies & a part_time secretary. {Berrington Hall},a N.T. property employs approx.10 people,3 in the Hall & 7 farming the estate.The{Balance Inn employs 2 full time & 2 part time staff.The{Nursery }at Eyton Hall which grows flowers & lettuce employs 3 people.The{sewage works}has 2 staff but is not fully_manned all day.{Eye} {Church}also has a vicar. The majority of the people who live in our area have to{commute}to work in the local towns such as Leominster & Hereford.
